Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays at Ashland/Lake due to track maintenance.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays at Ashland/Lake due to track maintenance.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #97 Skokie Temporary Reroute at Skokie Blvd/Golf Road
ShortDescription: 97 Skokie buses are temporarily rerouted via Skokie, Church, Crawford and Golf: due to, street blockage near Skokie Blvd/Golf Road.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#97 Skokie buses are temporarily rerouted via Skokie, Church, Crawford and Golf: due to, street blockage near Skokie Blvd/Golf Road.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express & #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express & #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Wacker Place & Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express & #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Wacker Place & Wacker: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
